script.speaker: Sundar Pichai
script.text: Our next contestant flew all the way from Milan, Italy, to grace our stage tonight. Please welcome Andrea, a passionate musician with a heart full of love and a song dedicated to one of our judges! Andrea, who are you serenading tonight, and what will you be performing?

script.speaker: Billie Joe Armstrong
script.text: Wow, bold move, dude! You got guts going full acoustic with a Michael Jackson song. I dig the stripped-down vibe.

script.speaker: Dave Grohl
script.text: Yeah, you really made it your own, man.  Takes confidence to reinterpret a legend like that. Nice work.

script.speaker: Alanis Morissette
script.text: There's a sweetness to your voice, Andrea. And choosing a love song... very vulnerable. You wear your heart on your sleeve.

script.speaker: Sara Bareilles
script.text: Well, Andrea, you certainly made this night even more memorable. It was incredibly flattering.  You have a really lovely voice.

script.speaker: Sundar Pichai
script.text: So, Andrea, has your heartfelt performance won over our judges? Let's see those votes!

script.speaker: Billie Joe Armstrong
script.text: It was a cool twist on a classic. I'm gonna say yes for the sheer bravery of it.

script.speaker: Dave Grohl
script.text: You got a good voice, dude. I'm a yes.

script.speaker: Alanis Morissette
script.text: It was heartfelt, Andrea. I'm saying yes.

script.speaker: Sara Bareilles
script.text: Andrea, you're very talented and very brave. It's a yes from me.

script.speaker: Sundar Pichai
script.text: Four yeses! Andrea, you've charmed your way to the next round! Download some more love songs, because this journey is just getting started!
